subject: Re: Question about locations for LPR
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Great! Thanks Bret. Will make sure there is a note on the work order for the tech to call you ahead of their arrival. Will keep you updated on any other questions and progress.
	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/GG1LX1QJMN.png> 


On Thu, May 22, 2025 at 1:52?PM JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	That location will work I need to be there during the install

	 

	 

	Bret Jones

	Traffic Operations

	City of Eugene

	O:541-682-4908

	C:541-228-5722

	 

	From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Thursday, May 22, 2025 1:24 PM
	To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
	Cc: Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >
	Subject: Re: Question about locations for LPR

	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Bret,

	 

	Map has been updated. This would be camera F042 on this Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c5827e74dc4e16361ebdd91866f4f511a5d101880421e01be34fde656de823fb010f4e2b18ef4aab54af5db25504cbe1d52c . If you are unable to access this map, here are the coordinate for the pole https://www.google.com/maps/place/44%C2%B003'53.5%22N+123%C2%B010'24.4%22W/@44.06486,-123.1740911,200m/data=!3m2!1e3!4b1!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d44.06486!4d-123.173446?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDUxNS4xIKXMDSoJLDEwMjExNDUzSAFQAw%3D%3D .

	 

	Let us know your thoughts.

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/GG1LX1QJMN.png> 

	 

	 

	On Thu, May 22, 2025 at 11:56?AM JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

		Give me a call when you have a minute

		 

		Bret Jones

		Traffic Operations

		City of Eugene

		O:541-682-4908

		C:541-228-5722

		 

		From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
		Sent: Thursday, May 22, 2025 11:51 AM
		To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
		Cc: Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >
		Subject: Re: Question about locations for LPR

		 

		[EXTERNAL ?]

		There is. There are a couple poles here with ample room for a camera + solar panel

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

		 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/GG1LX1QJMN.png> 

		 

		 

		On Thu, May 22, 2025 at 11:47?AM JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

			Would the signal pole on the SW corner of 569 and Roosevelt Blvd work for you?

			 

			 

			Bret Jones

			Traffic Operations

			City of Eugene

			O:541-682-4908

			C:541-228-5722

			 

			From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
			Sent: Thursday, May 22, 2025 11:41 AM
			To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
			Cc: Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >
			Subject: Re: Question about locations for LPR

			 

			[EXTERNAL ?]

			Does anything around the 569 & Roosevelt Blvd intersection fall in city ROW? See attached screenshot. Goal is to get NB traffic coming off of W 11th so if we move the camera to city ROW east of that intersection it would be hard to meet this.

			
			

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

			 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/GG1LX1QJMN.png> 

			 

			 

			On Thu, May 22, 2025 at 11:29?AM JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

				City of Eugene ROW is east of the middle of the intersection of 596 and W 11th. 

				 

				Bret Jones

				Traffic Operations

				City of Eugene

				O:541-682-4908

				C:541-228-5722

				 

				From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
				Sent: Thursday, May 22, 2025 9:41 AM
				To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
				Cc: Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >
				Subject: Re: Question about locations for LPR

				 

				[EXTERNAL ?]

				Bret,

				 

				Thank you for the quick response. For the ODOT location, where does city ROW start in relation to this? As long as we keep the intended capture Eugene PD wants, we can update this proposed location.

				 

				Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

				 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/GG1LX1QJMN.png> 

				 

				 

				On Thu, May 22, 2025 at 9:17?AM JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

					See below

					 

					Bret Jones

					Traffic Operations

					City of Eugene

					O:541-682-4908

					C:541-228-5722

					 

					From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
					Sent: Thursday, May 22, 2025 8:56 AM
					To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >
					Subject: Re: Question about locations for LPR

					 

					[EXTERNAL ?]

					Hey Bret,

					 

					Just spoke with Det Dewitt. Took him off this email so that we are not blowing up his inbox. You reviewed some locations for us yesterday and confirmed what is actually city ROW as opposed to ODOT. We have a few other locations listed as ODOT per our maps and are hoping you can help us confirm if this is accurate. Below are the coordinates for these locations:

					 

					44.048941, -123.172836 https://www.google.com/maps/place/44%C2%B002'56.2%22N+123%C2%B010'22.2%22W/@44.048941,-123.1754109,801m/data=!3m2!1e3!4b1!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d44.048941!4d-123.172836?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDUxNS4xIKXMDSoJLDEwMjExNDUzSAFQAw%3D%3D    (ODOT ROW)

					44.105956, -123.056706 https://www.google.com/maps/place/44%C2%B006'21.4%22N+123%C2%B003'24.1%22W/@44.105956,-123.0592863,800m/data=!3m2!1e3!4b1!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d44.105956!4d-123.056706?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDUxNS4xIKXMDSoJLDEwMjExNDUzSAFQAw%3D%3D    (Lane County ROW)

					44.065012, -123.137917 https://www.google.com/maps/place/44%C2%B003'54.0%22N+123%C2%B008'16.5%22W/@44.065012,-123.1404973,801m/data=!3m2!1e3!4b1!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d44.065012!4d-123.137917?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDUxNS4xIKXMDSoJLDEwMjExNDUzSAFQAw%3D%3D    (City of Eugene ROW)

					44.084968, -123.154894 https://www.google.com/maps/place/44%C2%B003'54.0%22N+123%C2%B008'16.5%22W/@44.065012,-123.1404973,801m/data=!3m2!1e3!4b1!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d44.065012!4d-123.137917?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDUxNS4xIKXMDSoJLDEwMjExNDUzSAFQAw%3D%3D    (City of Eugene ROW)

					 

					If they are in fact ODOT, we will work to shift them. Please let us know if you have any questions.

					 

					Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

					 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/GG1LX1QJMN.png> 

					 

					 

					On Wed, May 21, 2025 at 1:27?PM Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > wrote:

					Got it. Apologies. Just figured out the COE acronym. Will push these through to scheduling.

					 

					Thanks!

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

					 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/GG1LX1QJMN.png> 

					 

					 

					On Wed, May 21, 2025 at 1:21?PM JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

					All these location are in COE ROW.

					 

					Bret Jones

					Traffic Operations

					City of Eugene

					O:541-682-4908

					C:541-228-5722

					 

					From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
					Sent: Wednesday, May 21, 2025 1:19 PM
					To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
					Cc: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
					Subject: Re: Question about locations for LPR

					 

					[EXTERNAL ?]

					Do we

thread_messages.body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

					Hey Bret,

					 

					Just spoke with Det Dewitt. Took him off this email so that we are not blowing up his inbox. You reviewed some locations for us yesterday and confirmed what is actually city ROW as opposed to ODOT. We have a few other locations listed as ODOT per our maps and are hoping you can help us confirm if this is accurate. Below are the coordinates for these locations:

					 

					44.048941, -123.172836 https://www.google.com/maps/place/44%C2%B002'56.2%22N+123%C2%B010'22.2%22W/@44.048941,-123.1754109,801m/data=!3m2!1e3!4b1!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d44.048941!4d-123.172836?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDUxNS4xIKXMDSoJLDEwMjExNDUzSAFQAw%3D%3D    (ODOT ROW)

					44.105956, -123.056706 https://www.google.com/maps/place/44%C2%B006'21.4%22N+123%C2%B003'24.1%22W/@44.105956,-123.0592863,800m/data=!3m2!1e3!4b1!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d44.105956!4d-123.056706?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDUxNS4xIKXMDSoJLDEwMjExNDUzSAFQAw%3D%3D    (Lane County ROW)

					44.065012, -123.137917 https://www.google.com/maps/place/44%C2%B003'54.0%22N+123%C2%B008'16.5%22W/@44.065012,-123.1404973,801m/data=!3m2!1e3!4b1!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d44.065012!4d-123.137917?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDUxNS4xIKXMDSoJLDEwMjExNDUzSAFQAw%3D%3D    (City of Eugene ROW)

					44.084968, -123.154894 https://www.google.com/maps/place/44%C2%B003'54.0%22N+123%C2%B008'16.5%22W/@44.065012,-123.1404973,801m/data=!3m2!1e3!4b1!4m4!3m3!8m2!3d44.065012!4d-123.137917?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDUxNS4xIKXMDSoJLDEwMjExNDUzSAFQAw%3D%3D    (City of Eugene ROW)

					 

					If they are in fact ODOT, we will work to shift them. Please let us know if you have any questions.

					 

					Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager
